C:/Users/Deepak/Projects/EvolveNetworks/GA/reactionNetwork.h

00001 /*******************************************************
00002 
00003         Copyright (C) 2009 Deepak Chandran
00004         
00005         This file provides a convenient wrapper for the funtions in:
00006         
00007         massActionNetwork.h
00008         proteinInteractionNetwork.h
00009         geneRegulationNetwork.h
00010         
00011         Each file above contains the function needed for running 
00012         evolving networks using genetic algorithm (ga.h). This
00013         file defines a single network structure called "ReactionNetwork"
00014         that can contain any of the three above network types. 
00015         
00016         The mutation, crossover, simulation, and all the other functions
00017         from the three networks above are used to perform the same
00018         functions for this combined network.
00019 
00020 ********************************************************/
00021 
00022 #include "ga.h"
00023 #include "massActionNetwork.h"
00024 #include "proteinInteractionNetwork.h"
00025 #include "geneRegulationNetwork.h"
00026 
00027 #define MASS_ACTION_NETWORK 1
00028 #define PROTEIN_INTERACTION_NETWORK 2
00029 #define GENE_REGULATION_NETWORK 4
00030 
00031 #define MASS_ACTION_NETWORK_INDEX 0
00032 #define PROTEIN_INTERACTION_NETWORK_INDEX 1
00033 #define GENE_REGULATION_NETWORK_INDEX 2
00034 
00041 typedef struct 
00042 {
00043         //MASS_ACTION_NETWORK, PROTEIN_INTERACTION_NETWORK, or GENE_REGULATION_NETWORK
00044         int type; 
00045         
00046         //the network itself
00047         GAindividual network;
00048 }
00049 ReactionNetwork;
